mapper.select: select c.id, c.content, c.comment_time, c_f_u.id c_from_user_id, c_f_u.nickname c_from_user_nickname, c_f_u.avatar c_from_user_avatar, c_f_u.admin c_from_user_admin, r.id reply_id, r.content reply_content, r.reply_time, r_f_u.id r_from_user_id, r_f_u.nickname r_from_user_nickname, r_f_u.avatar r_from_user_avatar, r_t_u.id r_to_user_id, r_t_u.nickname r_to_user_nickname, r_t_u.avatar r_to_user_avatar from ( select inner_c.id, inner_c.content, inner_c.comment_time, inner_c.from_user_id from article_comment inner_c where inner_c.deleted = 0 and inner_c.article_id = #{articleId} order by inner_c.id desc limit #{offset},#{limit} ) c left join user c_f_u on c_f_u.id = c.from_user_id left join article_reply r on r.comment_id = c.id and r.deleted = 0 left join user r_f_u on r_f_u.id = r.from_user_id left join user r_t_u on r_t_u.id = r.to_user_id order by c.id desc, r.id asc

select c.id, c.content, c.comment_time, c_f_u.id c_from_user_id, c_f_u.nickname c_from_user_nickname, c_f_u.avatar c_from_user_avatar, a.id article_id, a.title article_title from ( select inner_c.id, inner_c.content, inner_c.comment_time, inner_c.from_user_id, inner_c.article_id from article_comment inner_c where inner_c.deleted = 0 order by inner_c.id desc limit 0,#{limit} ) c left join user c_f_u on c_f_u.id = c.from_user_id left join article a on a.id = c.article_id order by c.id desc
